result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.html: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidhThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ponchtml: Baineann na scéalta le saiġdiúirí a ṁaraítear agus na mná a ḟágtar ina ndiaiḋThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.

result.eng: Both men and women were there.
result.ga: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.orig: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná ann
result.html: Bhí idir fhir agus mhná annBoth men and women were there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí idir ḟir agus ṁná annBoth men and women were there.

result.eng: He isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ga: Níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.orig: Níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.html: Níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ponchtml: Níl suim aige in aon rud seaċas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.
result.ga: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.orig: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachta
result.html: Bhí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneachtaThree women were wading through the snow.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí triúr ban ag spágáil leo fríd an tsneaċtaThree women were wading through the snow.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.orig: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air
result.html: Bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do Mhicheál Dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ an tsaoil aige do Ṁiċeál Duḃ agus don ḃail a ċuir an ḃantraċt airHe felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
